message: Responsive is not Everything, You need to go Fully Mobile (Y)
caption: Attachment UnavailableThis attachment may have been removed or the person who shared it may not have permission to share it with you.

data.message: most of the time, when I visit a web site on my phone, and I see a half-a**ed version of the website I end up requesting Desktop version and if it didn't work, tough luck for them.
Oh Yeah :) I don't like going much for responsive but it's better targeting Devices such as Mobile/Tablets and Desktop version.
